Detailed Description

Dialog for the properties of a transition.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TransitionPropertiesDlgImpl::TransitionPropertiesDlgImpl (  QWidget * parent = 0,
const char * name = 0,
bool modal = FALSE,
WFlags fl = 0
) 
 

Constructs a TransitionPropertiesDlgImpl which is a child of 'parent', with the name 'name' and widget flags set to 'f'.

The dialog will by default be modeless, unless you set 'modal' to TRUE to construct a modal dialog.
